dialog.text: Hi %you.first_name%, I had the best weekend.  Had to work days but on Saturday night me and Pete watched the Ed Sheeran :smiling_face_with_3_hearts: concert on JamBase.  It was soooo good!  How about you?

joins.text: Sound like you had a great time.

dialog.text: At the meeting today I got tasked with doing more HTML and CSS on this new project - thought I would get something new to do :disappointed:  Tanya bagged the database task, which I wanted - she always seems to beat me to it!  Have you tried HackerRank yet?

joins.text: Its mental isn't it - totally no idea what is going on.
You should give it a go.  I've totally no idea what is going on.

dialog.text: Maybe we can work on a problem together sometime?  Anyway got to go - catch you later!
